1 Import packages

pacman::p_load(maptools, sf, raster, spatstat, tmap, dplyr, tidyverse)

2 Import geo-SG

sg_sf <- st_read(dsn = "data/coastal_outline", layer="CostalOutline")
Reading layer `CostalOutline' from data source 
  `C:\kt-x\IS415-Project\hdb carpark\data\coastal_outline' using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 60 features and 4 fields
Geometry type: POLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2663.926 ymin: 16357.98 xmax: 56047.79 ymax: 50244.03
Projected CRS: SVY21
mpsz_sf <- st_read(dsn = "data/mpsz", 
                layer = "MPSZ-2019")

  `C:\kt-x\IS415-Project\hdb carpark\data\mpsz' using driver `ESRI Shapefile'

Dimension:     XY

3 Import carpark data

carpark_sf <- st_as_sf(carpark, coords = c("x_coord", "y_coord"), crs=4326) %>%
  st_transform(crs = 3414)
